ALBench.metric.metric_impl package¶

Submodules¶

ALBench.metric.metric_impl.multi_class_metric module¶

class ALBench.metric.metric_impl.multi_class_metric.MultiClassMetric¶

Bases: src.skeleton.metric_skeleton.Metric

compute(epoch, preds, labels, losses, val_preds, val_labels, val_losses, test_preds, test_labels, test_losses, num_labeled=None, labeled=None)¶

Compute training metrics.

Parameters

  • epoch (int) – epoch number.

  • preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the entire pool.

  • labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the entire pool.

  • losses (numpy.ndarray) – Training loss values of the entire pool.

  • val_preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the validation set.

  • val_labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the validation set.

  • val_losses (numpy.ndarray) – Loss values of the validation set. One loss per example.

  • test_preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the test set.

  • test_labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the test set.

  • test_losses (numpy.ndarray) – Loss values of the test set. One loss per example.

  • num_labeled (Optional[int]) – Number of labeled examples in the pool.

  • labeled (Optional[numpy.ndarray]) – A binary array of the same size as the pool. Indicating whether an example is labeled or not.

Returns

A dictionary containing all logged metrics.

metric_name = 'multi_class'¶

ALBench.metric.metric_impl.multi_label_metric module¶

class ALBench.metric.metric_impl.multi_label_metric.MultiLabelMetric¶

Bases: src.skeleton.metric_skeleton.Metric

compute(epoch, preds, labels, losses, val_preds, val_labels, val_losses, test_preds, test_labels, test_losses, num_labeled=None, labeled=None)¶

Compute training metrics.

Parameters

  • epoch (int) – epoch number.

  • preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the entire pool.

  • labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the entire pool.

  • losses (numpy.ndarray) – Training loss values of the entire pool.

  • val_preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the validation set.

  • val_labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the validation set.

  • val_losses (numpy.ndarray) – Loss values of the validation set. One loss per example.

  • test_preds (numpy.ndarray) – Model predictions on the test set.

  • test_labels (numpy.ndarray) – Ground truth labels of the test set.

  • test_losses (numpy.ndarray) – Loss values of the test set. One loss per example.

  • num_labeled (Optional[int]) – Number of labeled examples in the pool.

  • labeled (Optional[numpy.ndarray]) – A binary array of the same size as the pool. Indicating whether an example is labeled or not.

Returns

A dictionary containing all logged metrics.
